intents.name: greeting
responses: Hi there! How can I help you with your bed booking?

intents.name: book_bed
responses: Booking a [bed_type] bed in [hospital_name]. Please provide your name and contact details.

intents.name: provide_details
patterns: my name is [name] and my contact number is [contact_number]
responses: Thanks, [name]! Your bed booking is confirmed. Please note your booking ID: 123456.

intents.name: cancel_booking
responses: Please provide your booking ID to cancel your booking.

intents.name: provide_booking_id
responses: Your booking has been cancelled. Thank you!

intents.name: fallback
responses: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please try again?
